title: By the King a proclamation for reformation of great abuses in measures.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
notes: "Giuen at his Maiesties Castle of Windsor the fift day of Iuly, 1603. in the first yeere of our Reigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland the sixe and thirtieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
